description:
As a user
  I want to see and change a counter value on the home page
  So that I can interact with a simple stateful component

steps.name: the counter is mounted in the DOM
the counter is mounted in the DOM
the counter is mounted in the DOM
I click the increment button again
the counter is mounted in the DOM
the counter is mounted in the DOM
I click the decrement button again
the counter is mounted in the DOM
the counter store count is set to 5
the counter display is updated to reflect the new value
the counter is mounted in the DOM
the counter is initialized and I have clicked increment
I navigate away from the home page
click events are removed from the counter buttons

elements.name: Counter init fails when mount element is missing

steps.name: the counter is mounted in the DOM
the counter mount element does not exist
I try to initialize the counter
an error "Element not found" is thrown

name: Counter

description:
As a user
  I want to see a value that is the main counter multiplied by 10
  So that I can see a derived state from the counter store

elements.name: Multiple counter updates when store changes

steps.name: the counter store count is set to 3
the counter store count is set to 5

elements.name: Multiple counter init fails when mount element is missing

steps.name: the multiple counter mount element does not exist
I try to initialize the multiple counter
an error "Element not found" is thrown

elements.name: Multiple counter subscribes to counter store

steps.name: the multiple counter display is updated to "20"

name: Multiple counter

description:
As a user
  I want to navigate through the application
  So that I can access different pages with proper state management

steps.name: I should see the home page content
the page title should be "Bun Front Boilerplate"
I should see the About page content
the page title should be "Bun Front Boilerplate"

name: Front-end Router

description:
As a user
  I want to navigate between application pages
  So that I can access Home and About with the correct controller and template

steps.name: I should see the home page content
the page title should be "Bun Front Boilerplate"
the home template should be rendered
I should see the About page content
the page title should be "Bun Front Boilerplate"
the about template should be rendered

elements.name: Routes map defines Home and About

steps.name: each route should have a template and controller

name: Routes

description:
As a user
  I want to use the application in my preferred language
  So that I can understand and interact with the interface effectively

steps.name: I visit the application for the first time
if the browser language is supported, it is set as current language
if the browser language is not supported, French is set as default
I have previously selected a language
the stored language preference is retrieved
the application uses the stored language
the language preference persists across sessions
all UI elements with data-translate are updated
the language preference is saved to localStorage
I have translation data for multiple languages
the translation for the current language is returned
if the current language translation is missing, French is used as fallback
if no translation is found, "Not found" is returned
I have UI elements with data-translate attributes
all elements with data-translate are updated
the text content reflects the new language
I check the translation keys used in the app
the language preference is stored under this key
I have a translation object with missing languages
the system falls back to French if the current language is missing
the system returns "Not found" if no translations are available
no errors are thrown for missing translations

name: Translation and internationalization

description:
As a user
  I want to see the current application version
  So that I can track updates and report issues accurately

steps.name: I am on any page of the application
the version is retrieved from the version constant
the version is displayed in the element with id "version"
I have a version element in the DOM
the version element text content is updated
the version matches the package version format
the version element is not present in the DOM
the function handles the missing element gracefully
the version is displayed in the header or footer
the version is visible to the user
I have a version from the version constant
the version is a valid string

name: Application version display
